sections.title: Why off-the-shelf event platforms fall short
sections.content:
In today's dynamic events landscape, generic website builders often come with limitations. They force you into rigid templates, take a cut of your ticket sales, and lack the specific features your event truly needs. The result: a website that looks like every other, limiting your brand's potential and hampering the attendee experience.

Kliv empowers you to build an event website that is as unique as your event. With AI-assisted development, you can craft a platform that perfectly aligns with your vision, offering custom integrations, bespoke branding, and a tailored user journey.

sections.title: The strategic advantage of a custom event website
sections.content:
## Overcoming limitations of template-based solutions

Many event organizers turn to popular platforms for speed, but quickly discover their pitfalls:

- **Generic branding**: Your event loses its unique identity when confined to predefined templates.
- **Limited monetization**: High transaction fees on ticketing and sponsorships eat into your profits.
- **Integration headaches**: Difficulty connecting with CRM, marketing automation, or bespoke management tools.
- **Scalability concerns**: Platforms struggle with sudden traffic spikes or evolving feature requirements.
- **Data ownership**: You don't fully control your attendee data, impacting future marketing and analysis.

## Why a custom-built approach excels

Building your event website with Kliv leverages advanced AI to provide unmatched benefits:

### Complete brand immersion
Your website becomes a true extension of your event's brand, with pixel-perfect design, custom fonts, and a user experience that reinforces your unique identity.

### Unrestricted monetization
Implement your own ticketing system, sponsorship tiers, and payment gateways without sharing revenue with third-party platforms. Maximize your profits.

### Seamless ecosystem integration
Connect your event website directly to your existing sales, marketing, and operational tools via custom APIs, creating a unified data flow.

### Future-proof scalability
Designed to handle immense traffic and rapidly adapt to new features as your event grows. Add virtual components, networking tools, or new content types easily.

### Full data ownership & insights
All attendee data is yours. Leverage it for deeper analytics, personalized attendee experiences, and more effective future marketing campaigns.

## Real-world impact

Custom event websites built on platforms like Kliv are revolutionizing event management:

**Academic Conferences**: Creating specialized portals for abstract submissions, peer review, session scheduling, and post-conference paper access.

**Music Festivals**: Building dynamic sites with interactive artist lineups, real-time stage schedules, food vendor maps, and integrated cashless payment systems.

**Trade Shows**: Developing exhibitor management portals, interactive floor plans, lead capture tools for attendees, and private meeting scheduling features.

**Corporate Seminars**: Crafting secure, invite-only platforms for board meetings or executive summits, with document sharing, live polling, and private Q&A.

## Kliv's AI-powered construction

The perception that custom development is costly and time-consuming is outdated. Kliv changes that:

- **Natural language interface**: Describe your event website features verbally or in text, and AI begins to scaffold the application.
- **Rapid iteration**: See functional prototypes within hours, allowing for quick feedback and adjustments.
- **Optimized codebase**: AI generates clean, efficient code, ensuring high performance and security.
- **Integrated testing**: Automated checks ensure all functions, from registration to content display, work flawlessly.

Don't settle for 'good enough.' Build an event website that truly differentiates your offering and delivers an exceptional experience for your attendees and organizers.

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions about building on Kliv

items.answer: A basic event website can be functional within hours. More complex conference sites with advanced features might take a few days of iterative building and refinement.
items.question: How quickly can I build an event website using Kliv?

items.answer: No coding is required. You describe the features, design, and functionality you envision using natural language. Kliv's AI translates your input into a fully functional website.
items.question: Do I need technical skills or coding knowledge?

items.answer: Yes, your custom website can integrate with almost any external service that offers an API, including CRM systems, email marketing platforms, video conferencing tools, and analytics solutions.
items.question: Can my custom event website integrate with existing tools?

items.answer: You retain full ownership of the developed application and all user data. Kliv simply provides the platform and AI assistance to build it, ensuring you have complete control and security.
items.question: Who owns the intellectual property and data created?

items.answer: Pricing is typically a one-time build cost, which is often far more cost-effective than continuous subscription fees and per-attendee charges from SaaS event platforms, especially for recurring or large-scale events.
items.question: How does the cost compare to typical event platform subscriptions?

items.answer: Absolutely. One of the core advantages is the flexibility to modify, expand, or pivot your website's features as your event needs evolve, without being limited by platform restrictions or vendor timelines.
items.question: Can I update or add new features to the website later?

items.answer: Yes, custom-built websites allow you to implement specific security protocols and data handling policies, offering a level of control and potentially greater security than multi-tenant SaaS solutions.
